DOC.brief_summary: Does clinical hypnosis neuro-linguistic programming improve success rate external cephalic version ?
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Hypnosis Before External Cephalic Version ( ECV )
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective off-center randomisation clinical hypnosis neuro-linguistic programming intervention prior external cephalic version treatment .
DOC.criteria: singleton breech presentation gestation age 36 week + 6 day multiple understand German language
